typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(country),
	department = count(empid)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(input(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		deptid as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['harishaggregate.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
